title: Encounter V
credit_line: Gift of the A. W. Mellon Educational and Charitable Trust
provenance_text:
Lynn Russell Chadwick [1914-2003], Upper Coberley, Cheltenham, England and Lypiatt Park, Gloucestershire, England [1]; Saidenberg Gallery, New York, NY [2]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, March 1959 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The sculpture was exhibited (no. 86) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. 
[2]. Payment for the sculpture was sent to Saidenberg Gallery (artist's representative) on March 30, 1959 (see curatorial file.)
[2]. The A. W. Mellon Educational and Charitable Trust purchased the sculpture for Carnegie Institute from the International. It was accessioned on March 25, 1959.
